svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/50.0.2661.102 Safari/537.36" version="5.5.1.2" editor="www.draw.io" type="onedrive"><diagram></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 37px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: 3. select (e, d), so that (e * d) mod ϕ = 1

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 32px; white-space: nowrap; word-wrap: normal;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: m = (me mod n ) d mod n = me * d mod n = m

switch.text: m = (m<sup>e </sup>mod n ) <sup>d</sup> mod n = m<sup>e * d </sup>mod n = m
